author: Andrew Jeong
title: Top South Korean Adviser Questions Long-Term Future of U.S. Alliance
text:
SEOUL—A senior adviser to South Korea’s president rekindled discussions about whether Seoul could alter its ties with Washington as part of a deal to persuade Pyongyang to give up its nuclear weapons by suggesting an end to the country’s military alliance with the U.S. in the longer run.
